demonlist
  • Usage
  • View page source

Usage

Installation

To use demonlist, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ pip install demonlist

Import

After installation, you need to import the library in to your code:

1import demonlist

Example

For example, you can call demonlist.Demonlist.sign_in() function to log in to your account:

async demonlist.Demonlist.sign_in()

Logging in to the account.

Parameters

  • login (str) – user’s login

  • password (str) – user’s password

Raises

exceptions.WrongCredentials – If credentials are invalid

Returns

True if the account was successfully logged in

Return type

bool

demonlist.Demonlist.sign_in() will raise an exception.

exception exceptions.WrongCredentials

Raised if the user entered the wrong data to login.

To do this, write the code below:

 1from demonlist import Demonlist
 2import asyncio
 3
 4
 5async def main():
 6    client = Demonlist()
 7    await client.sign_in(login='SuperMinecrafter228', password='619')
 8
 9if __name__ == '__main__':
10    asyncio.get_event_loop().run_until_complete(main())
